h3.span: Updated travel information related to 2019 Novel (New) Coronavirus can be found at:

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px; margin-left: 40px;

span.style: font-family: Lato, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91);

a.style: box-sizing: border-box; transition: background 0.3s ease 0s; line-height: inherit; outline: 0px !important;
a.title: CDC Travel Notices

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: There are currently no vaccines available to protect against this virus. The New York State Department of Health (NYSDOH) recommends the following ways to minimize the spread of all respiratory viruses, including 2019-nCoV:

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% alcohol if soap and water are not available.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Avoid close contact with people who are sick.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Stay home when you are sick.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue or your sleeve (not your hands) when coughing or sneezing. If you use a tissue, throw it in the trash.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • Routinely clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: • CDC recommends that travelers avoid all travel to China.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: Information to date suggests that 2019-nCoV causes mild-to-moderate illness and symptoms like the flu, including fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;

span.span: This is an emerging, rapidly changing situation. For questions please contact the Erie County department of health or the NYSDOH Novel Coronavirus hotline at

p.style: font-size: 16px; color: rgb(59, 62, 91); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px;
p.span: We encourage you to keep up to date about 2019-nCoV, its treatment and prevention by visiting the following websites.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 30px; margin-left: 40px;

a.span: NYSED Coronavirus Information and Guidance for Schools

div.style: float: right; position: absolute; display: none

div.p: North Collins Central School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. North Collins Central School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
